channel.title: How do you delete Objects?
channel.description: How do you delete and object thats at 3093, 3492? Please help? deleteObject(3093, 3492); Is that how you do it and if so where would you put it in the client.java?

item.title: How do you delete Objects?
item.dc:creator: @wouterscape wouterscape
item.description:
@wouterscape wrote:

you need to know if u got public void deleteObject(int objectX, int objectY) if u dont have add this

public void deleteObject(int objectX, int objectY) { outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(60); outStream.writeByte(objectY - (mapRegionY * 8)); outStream.writeByteC(objectX - (mapRegionX * 8)); /*DELETE OBJECT*/ outStream.writeByte(101); outStream.writeByteC(0); outStream.writeByte(0); }

if u have this leave this and search for

} public void NewObjects() {
underthat add

deleteObject(x coors, y coords);
